about_the_game:
Jumping Frog -A Time Traveller- is a first-person exploratory jumping action game.

The game is an exhilarating game in which the player controls a robot that can jump to high altitudes and repeatedly ascends and descends through stages with many elevation differences.

Collect the four items in the stage to reach the goal.

[Features]

・Feel great (Jump! Drop! Jump!)

・Simple rules (Collect the 4 items to reach the goal ! )

・15 unique stages in all (including 5 boss stage)

・Supports game controllers. (Xbox360,PS4,etc.)

・High score recording feature.

・Simple 3D design reminiscent of the 1990s.

・This game can be played on computers that do not have high specs.
(Playable with on-board graphics(integrated graphics))

[MISC]

・It is not a vast game, as it is developed by one person.

・This game may have some parts that are not perfect.

・We would appreciate your support :)

name: Jumping Frog -A Time Traveller-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10,Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8550U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: display resolution 1280*720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: display resolution 1920x1080 (16:9 aspect ratio)

Collect the 4 items in the stage to reach the goal.
